name: Snail Trek - Chapter 4: The Final Fondue
description: Relive 1980s nostalgia in this text parser driven graphic adventure game. You and your molluscan crew embark on an epic journey to find a new home world. In Chapter 4 - The Final Fondue, the story concludes. Your entire civilization is heading towards its doom, and it's up to you to save the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
